summary.title: Clothing Rental System Threat Model
summary.description: Threat model for a clothing rental system with a public interface (login, register, homepage) and an admin interface (post & account management).

threats.description: SQL Injection in the Public Web App.
XSS attacks on the Public Web App.
Possible DoS on the Public Web App.
Broken Access Control on the Admin Dashboard.
Database vulnerabilities may lead to unauthorized data access.
